blogPost.excerpt: My Wolfpack is a friendly app that microgroups people according to their interests. If you are not particularly looking for dating but don’t want to meet people in huge groups that forbids you to really get to know them, you are in the right place.
blogPost.body: My Wolfpack is a friendly app that microgroups people according to their interests. If you are not particularly looking for dating but don’t want to meet people in huge groups that forbids you to really get to know them, you are in the right place.
blogPost.title: My Wolfpack - Meet new friends according to your interests in micro-groups
blogPost.author: Murat Aksu

localize.description: My Wolfpack是一款友好的应用程序，可以根据人们的兴趣对他们进行微分组。如果你不是特别想要约会，但又不想结识一大群阻碍你真正了解他们的人，那你就来对地方了。
localize.tagline: 根据你在微群中的兴趣结识新朋友

localize.description: My Wolfpack是一款友好的應用程序，可以根據人們的興趣對他們進行微分組。如果你不是特別想要約會，但又不想結識一大羣阻礙你真正瞭解他們的人，那你就來對地方了。
localize.tagline: 根據你在微羣中的興趣結識新朋友

previous.excerpt: The Idea Generator by AreYouInterested is a completely free tool to structure your idea generation. It guides you through the Niche-Action-Problem brainstorming system, and allows you to see the ideas that other members of the community came up with, too.
previous.title: The Idea Generator - A tool to help structure your business idea brainstorming

localize.description: AreYouInterest的Idea Generator是一个完全免费的工具，用于构建您的创意生成。它引导您通过利基-行动-问题集思广益系统，并允许您看到其他社区成员提出的想法。
localize.tagline: 集思广益，帮助组织您的商业想法的工具

localize.description: AreYouInterest的Idea Generator是一個完全免費的工具，用於構建您的創意生成。它引導您通過利基-行動-問題集思廣益系統，並允許您看到其他社區成員提出的想法。
localize.tagline: 集思廣益，幫助組織您的商業想法的工具

next.excerpt: Onrise helps you to build nano habits and work more effectively. Standing on the latest research about behavior design and productivity, Onrise is your guide to achieve your goals. Give it a try and become the person you aspire to be!
next.title: Onrise - Build nano habits to become the person you aspire to be

localize.description: OnRise帮助你养成纳米习惯，让你的工作更有效率。站在关于行为设计和生产力的最新研究上，OnRise是你实现目标的指南。试一试，成为你渴望成为的人！
localize.tagline: 养成纳米习惯，成为你渴望成为的人

localize.description: OnRise幫助你養成納米習慣，讓你的工作更有效率。站在關於行爲設計和生產力的最新研究上，OnRise是你實現目標的指南。試一試，成爲你渴望成爲的人！
localize.tagline: 養成納米習慣，成爲你渴望成爲的人
